description:
You can`t have a revolution without muscle, and nobody during the Bakumatsu had more muscle than Saigo Takamori. See how the big brother of the Meiji restoration helped take down the Shogunate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindness Is Strength: Saigo Takamori! Moving Up the Ranks
Yasashisa wa Chikara Nari, Saigou Takamori! Dondon Shusse Hen
やさしさは力なり, 西郷隆盛! ~どんどん出世編~
